categories: Category:Star Wars: The High Republic Adventures — The Monster of Temple Peak

nodes.text: The High Republic Adventures — The Monster of Temple Peak 2

The High Republic Adventures — The Monster of Temple Peak 2 is the forthcoming second issue of the canon comic book miniseries Star Wars: The High Republic Adventures — The Monster of Temple Peak. It will be written by Cavan Scott with art by Rachael Stott and is scheduled to be published by IDW Publishing on September 8, 2021.
Follow former Jedi turned saber-for-hire monster hunter Ty Yorrick in this adventure-packed High Republic miniseries by Cavan Scott and Rachael Stott!

Ty begins the trek up Temple Peak, but the mountain's hungry creatures and slippery edges put her rusty Force skills to the test. Dangerous monsters, cliffs, and battles are second nature for Ty, though. But dealing with people? Well, that may be the hardest part of her mission…
